Replace all
This action will replace all matches of the 'Find' field with the 'Replace with' field in the given variable's value.
note
The 'Find' field can accept a regex, so you may need to escape certain characters if you run into issues.
Parameters
â€‹
Variable name (text)
Find (text)
Replace with (text)
